name: Shopping Rush
description:
Created for BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2021.2

Control: 

W,S,Mouse move - Movement

Story:

Bob started Screaming at Lily in front of all the customers of the store.

Lily is a shy girl, so she could not answer him at that moment.

But she decided she was going to make him a lot of Chaos in life.

Your goal is to DESTROY as much as you can Bob's shop until the police will come.
